<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"OBK Report Webhook"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"event"}
  path={"webhook"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



We send a webhook for every step on the report creation. 

You can sign this webhook in the logged area of this portal or via [API](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook).

The webhook sign is a endpoint that our webhook flow will call for every step update on the report creation  (```ENQUEUED```, ```PROCESSING```, ```CREATED``` and ```ERROR```).

When report is ```CREATED```, the last call to the client endpoint will be made, and within the request, a download URL will be available.

You can also configure the security validation method for the requests, which can be either ```mTLS Certificate``` or ```Hash Signature (HMAC SHA256 Hash)```.

For more information on the security validation methods, check the ```AUTHORIZATIONS``` section below.

For more information on webhooks, see the [Webhook Documentation](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook).

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}

</Heading>
